title: OCES_eyes Shared eye properties definition
description: This schema defines all properties that all eyes must have.

name.description: The user-defined name of this set of eye data

enabled.description: Whether this eye is enabled or not

mirrorPlanes.description: An array of the id(s) of the mirror plane(s) to use to mirror this eye's data across (in the Head Coordinate Space of this eye's closest Head ancestor)

items.description: The id of a mirror plane to use to mirror this eye's data across (in the Head Coordinate Space of this eye's closest and only Head ancestor)
